name: The Zone (UglyZebraInteractive)
description:
The Zone is roguelike survival game where your goal is to destroy all enemies on each wave without dying 

At the end of each round you may pick a permanent upgrade

At fixed intervals, the world will swap to the below realm, where you cannot shoot and you need to run

Controls:

Movement -> WASD

Shoot -> Space Bar

Esc -> Pause
